name: Slime-o-Mancers
description:
Stem the tide of slimes by joining the elements together!

Use A W and D keys to conjure a slime, use the S key to cancel.

Click and hold the left mouse button to steer slimes towards your target.

Conjure two slimes at once to join them together.

Hit groups of matching slimes to increase your score!

If the controls are not responding, try refreshing the page.

Created in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021
